title: Resume
text:
University of California, Berkeley — B.A. in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics, Minor in Data Science; GPA: 3.97
Berkeley, CA | August 2022 – May 2026
Northwood High School — GPA: 4.28
Irvine, CA | August 2018 – June 2022

title: Resume
text:
University of California, Berkeley — B.A. in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics, Minor in Data Science; GPA: 3.97
Berkeley, CA | August 2022 – May 2026
Northwood High School — GPA: 4.28
Irvine, CA | August 2018 – June 2022

title: Resume
text:
Experience
Undergraduate Course Staff — UC Berkeley
Berkeley, CA | August 2023 – Present

Lead Teaching Assistant for CS 188 (AI), DATA 100, and DATA C8.

Created assignments, discussion materials, maintained course website, and led office hours.

Undergraduate Research Assistant / Mentor — UC Berkeley, Algoverse
Berkeley, CA | August 2023 – Present

Cross-Platform SQL Rewrite Optimization: Generalized rewrite rules for SQL optimization across distributed database platforms (Apache Calcite, CockroachDB).

Forecasting Adversarial Multi-Agent Behavior: Built real-time chain-of-thought (CoT) prompting system using multimodal LLMs to predict crowd behavior from video.

Ontology-Guided Detection of Semantic Leakage: Developed ontology-based method to detect errors in CoT reasoning, improving AI interpretability.

Empirical Analysis of FDA Citizen Petitions: Collected and analyzed 20 GB of petitions to evaluate FDA responsiveness.

Human Strategy Updating via Peer Advice: Modeled human strategy updates using inverse reinforcement learning and random forest classification.

AI for Pancreatic Cancer Detection: Built ML models to predict pancreatic cancer from clinical datasets.

Applied AI Engineer Intern — Power Meta Corp.
Irvine, CA | May 2024 – July 2024

Applied AI-driven resource allocation and optimization in decentralized GPU grid computing for blockchain.

Integrated machine learning methods to improve blockchain model efficiency and scalability.

title: Resume
text:
Projects
BearCourseHub — Swift, SwiftUI, Firebase | August 2023 – December 2023

Developed an iOS app delivering curated course information and customizable features to enhance UC Berkeley students’ experience.

Course Projects — Java, Python | March 2023 – Present

Built a simple database from scratch including B+ trees, join algorithms, and query optimization.

Built a traceroute tool in Python to analyze network paths and latency.

Built a neural network from scratch with convolutional, batch normalization, and pooling layers.

Developed a 2D tile-based procedural world exploration engine enabling user interaction.

title: Resume
text:
Other

Relevant Coursework: Machine Learning (A+), Artificial Intelligence (A+), Database Systems (A), Introduction to Internet (A+), Probability for Data Science (A+), Computer Architecture (A+), DATA 100 (A+), Numerical Analysis (A+), Computer Vision, NLP, Data Mining, Agentic AI

Awards and Honors: Dean’s List, Honors to Date, EECS Honors
Programming Languages: Java, Python, C, SQL, Swift, SwiftUI, RISC-V, R, Javascript

Developer Tools: Git, VS Code, PyCharm, RStudio, IntelliJ, MongoDB

Libraries: pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, seaborn, PyTorch, Tidyverse, scikit, Otter

Languages: Native Chinese

title: Wesley Kai Zheng
text:
Hello! Welcome to my personal site! I am a fourth-year student at UC Berkeley, studying Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, and Data Science.
I am currently a TA for Data 8: Foundations of Data Science. Previously, I have served as a TA for Data 100: Principles and Techniques of Data Science and CS 188: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence.
